5.084038 - SELECT  COUNT(notes.id) as count from notes where notes.status =0 and notes.user_id_to=14
6.182909 - select id ,sku, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(contents, '$.nl.title')) as title from product
                                where LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(contents, '$.nl.title'))) like 'th%'
                                or sku like 'th%'
                                or id like 'th%'
                                limit  10
5.919218 - select orders.id,
                             JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(order_details, '$.address.payment.firstname')) as firstname,
                             JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(order_details, '$.address.payment.lastname')) as lastname,
                             title
                             from orders
                             left join order_status on orders.status_id = order_status.id
                             where LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.payment.firstname'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.payment.lastname'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.payment.zipcode'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.payment.company'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.shipping.firstname'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.shipping.lastname'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.shipping.zipcode'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.address.shipping.company'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.order_details, '$.customerEmail'))) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER (orders.invoicenr) like 'th%'
                             OR LOWER(JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(orders.payment, '$.payment_identifier'))) like 'th%'
                             OR orders.id like 'th%'
                             limit  10
